game.name: Flash Doll
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 물리 엔진으로 구동되는 트렌디한 장난감 피규어, 자동 전투, 커스터마이징 가능한 기술, 친구들을 불러서 온라인에서 귀뚜라미 대결을 즐기세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Physics engine-powered trendy toy figures, automatic battles, customizable moves, bring your friends and fight crickets together online!

reviewHighlights.text: After having played their previous game, I was looking forward to this one, only to find out that it is a barebones buggy mess with nothing to do but...
